original_text: “For this reason a man will leave his father and mother and be united to his wife, and the two will become one flesh.”
korean_text: 그러므로 사람이 부모를 떠나 그의 아내와 합하여 그 둘이 한 육체가 될지니

sentences.original_text: a man will leave his father and mother
sentences.korean_translation: 한 남자가 그의 아버지와 어머니를 떠나

sentences.original_text: and be united to his wife
and the two will become one flesh
sentences.korean_translation: 그 둘이 한 육체가 될 것입니다
